Posts.Content:
This letter is for all "The Girls" at Healing Well who sent the BEAUTIFUL Rose bouquet for Connie P.'s funeral.  Please forgive if this email seems impersonal- but it is an attempt by the family to extend a big 
...   However, we don't know all the individuals involved and thought this the only way to contact the entire group.  It is our hope that this will reach and/or be passed on to "The Girls" and anyone involved in this most kind gesture of sending flowers.
Posts.Title: Flowers for Connie's funeral

Posts.Content: There are no answers, only questions. Prayers for strength & comfort for Carla's family. >>>L&H..Connie..14 & 2 >>>
Posts.Title: Obit for Carla -- Ohiored

Posts.Content: Janice, I know how these txs have beat you down. Please know all of us are praying for you to have strength & the tx to work!! >>>L&H..Connie..14 & 1 >>>
Posts.Title: Here's an update on me.....

Posts.Content: Thrilled you're doing better, Mary!! Thinking of & praying for you. >>>L&H..Connie..14 >>>
Posts.Title: maryt

Posts.Content: Carla, praying the rad/gamma knife takes care of this! On the plus side, it's one spot & that's a lot easier to tx. Give your dad a hug for us all. >>>L&H..Connie..14 >>>
Posts.Title: More bad news...
